{{dcl header | experimental/filesystem}}
{{dcl | since=fs_ts | 1=
enum class file_type {
    none = 0,
    not_found = -1,
    regular = 1,
    directory = 2,
    symlink = 3,
    block = 4,
    character = 5,
    fifo = 6,
    socket = 7,
    unknown = 8
};
}}
{{dcl end}}

指示路径所代表的文件或目录的类型。

===常量===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem |常量|含义}}
{{dsc | {{tt|none}} | 指示文件状态尚未求值，或其求值时发生了错误}}
{{dsc | {{tt|not_found}} | 指示文件未找到（不被当做错误）}}
{{dsc | {{tt|regular}} | 常规文件}}
{{dsc | {{tt|directory}} | 目录}}
{{dsc | {{tt|symlink}} | 符号链接}}
{{dsc | {{tt|block}} | 块特殊文件}}
{{dsc | {{tt|character}} | 字符特殊文件}}
{{dsc | {{tt|fifo}} | FIFO（又称管道）文件}}
{{dsc | {{tt|socket}} | 套接字（socket）文件}}
{{dsc | {{tt|unknown}} | 未知文件}}
{{dsc end}}
